item.description:
The extended Lord of the Rings trilogy second part: The Two Towers.  Three hours of new (previously cut?) footage added to the films.  Each film gets a greeting by the director, Peter Jackson.  He is in New Zealand filming the prequel, The Hobbit.  This was also posted on the Hartford Area Movie Meetup.

 

For tickets go to www.fathomevents.com.  They are $13.50 each.

See you there.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be in the lobby at 6:30 pm. The film starts 7:00 pm.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: The Lord of the Rings Trilogy - The Two Towers
